mapper.select: SELECT date_range.Date AS date, MAX(rooms.room_availability) - COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN reservation.start_date <= date_range.Date AND reservation.end_date > date_range.Date THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS availableRooms FROM ( SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL n DAY) AS Date FROM for_count WHERE DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL n DAY) <= LAST_DAY(CURDATE()) ) AS date_range LEFT JOIN rooms ON rooms.room_number = #{roomNumber} LEFT JOIN reservation ON reservation.room_number = rooms.room_number GROUP BY date_range.Date ORDER BY date_range.Date;
mapper.insert: insert into reservation(reservation_number, reservation_time, id, start_date, end_date, status, nickname, phone_number, room_category, room_price, coupon_number, coupon_name, discount, use_point, total_price, payment_amount, guest_name, guest_phone, accom_number, accom_name, room_number) values (#{reservationNumber}, #{reservationTime}, #{id}, #{startDate},#{endDate}, 0, #{nickname},#{phoneNumber}, #{roomCategory},#{roomPrice},#{couponNumber},#{couponName},#{discount}, #{usePoint},#{totalPrice},#{paymentAmount},#{gusetName},#{gusetPhone}, #{accomNumber},#{accomName},#{roomNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_coupon SET is_used = 1 WHERE coupon_number = #{couponNumber}
